topic.title: HP Helion Openstack Carrier Grade (Beta): Installing HP StoreVirtual VSA

body.p: This page provides detailed instructions on deployment of HP StoreVirtual VSA Storage Nodes, and their configuration as Cinder backend. It covers the following topics:
Use the following steps to install HP StoreVirtual VSA in your HP Helion Openstack Carrier Grade cloud.

li.p: On the KVM host, change to the directory where your cloud is installed.
Go to the folder where cloud is created.
This folder contains a cinder_conf_default.sample file.
Copy that file to cinder_conf_default using any standard method, such as the cp command:
Modify the cinder_conf_default with values based on your environment.
The parameters in file are as follows. If required more parameters can be added to this file.

codeblock.codeph: hplefthand_username = <username> hplefthand_password = <password> hplefthand_clustername = <Cluster Name> hplefthand_api_url = https://<Iscsi Virtual IP address>/lhos

li.p: Run the following command to copy the parameters in the cinder_conf_default to the cinder.conf file in the CND-SVC role.

body.p: The next time the CND-SVC role is implemented, the role will have the StoreVirtual Information.
